typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		company_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		zip as string,
		phone1 as string,
		phone2 as string,
		email as string,
		web as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		state as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Statelookup
source1, Statelookup lookup(source1@state == Statelookup@state,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
